parameter-group.name: tags
parameter-group.label: Additional Tags
parameter-group.description: This group defines additional tags which can be added to your measurements.

parameter.name: token
parameter.label: Authentication Token
parameter.description: The token to authenticate to database (alternative to username/password for InfluxDB 2.0)

parameter.name: db
parameter.label: Database/Organization
parameter.description: The name of the database (InfluxDB 1.0) or Organization for (InfluxDB 2.0)

parameter.name: retentionPolicy
parameter.label: Retention Policy / Bucket
parameter.description: The name of the retention policy (Influx DB 1.0) or bucket (InfluxDB 2.0) to write data

parameter.name: replaceUnderscore
parameter.label: Replace Underscore
parameter.description: Whether underscores "_" in item names should be replaced by a dot "." ("test_item" -> "test.item"). Only for measurement name, not for tags. Also applies to alias names.

parameter.name: addCategoryTag
parameter.label: Add Category Tag
parameter.description: Should the category of the item be included as tag "category"? If no category is set, "n/a" is used.

parameter.name: addTypeTag
parameter.label: Add Type Tag
parameter.description: Should the item type be included as tag "type"?

parameter.name: addLabelTag
parameter.label: Add Label Tag
parameter.description: Should the item label be included as tag "label"? If no label is set, "n/a" is used.
